about_the_game:
Super high degree of freedom in decoration to create a unique inn

There are over 300 unique pieces of furniture in the game, each with 4-5 color casts. You can build any inn you want, such as cyberpunk style, Chinese style, pink girl style... In addition, you can freely place rooms and windows, and change the floor and wallpaper of the room. You can also light your room yourself to create the mood you want.

Running an inn

Run your inn, prepare dishes according to customer needs, serve food to customers, mix drinks, and drive away troublemakers!

Mix drinks, listen to stories, and become an intelligence master

During the store opening process, you'll listen to your customers' stories and create cocktails based on their emotional needs. In addition, you can also obtain various interstellar intelligence rumors and become a part of the interstellar underground intelligence network.

Rich food

There are more than 60 unique dishes for players to cook, each with detailed 3D models.

Not just an inn, but also many other businesses

Not only can you open an inn, you can also develop various businesses such as space SPA, fight club, starry sky cinema, space bookstore, etc.~

Space farming

Grow various space plants in the culture chamber, adjust the light, oxygen concentration, nutrient solution concentration, etc., so that the plants can grow vigorously

Raising alien animals

More than 20 cute alien animals are available for breeding. Each alien animal has a variety of detailed appearances. They can become your pets, hugging and holding them high with you.

Fish farming

More than 15 alien fish species are available for players to breed in fish tanks.

Spaceship Mining & Exploration

You can modify and pilot your spaceship, mine in asteroid fields, explore and hunt for treasures

Make friends with various space residents

There are a large number of flesh-and-blood NPC characters in the game, 12 of which can support romance. Interact with them, learn more about their hobbies, and become good friends or even lovers by completing their tasks and sending gifts.

Buy a luxury house and enjoy life

buy all kinds of luxury houses and cool spaceships, and enjoy life with your lover!

Moving main story

The world of the game takes place in a sub-light interstellar civilization. The protagonist comes to this galaxy in order to find his mother who disappeared during a scientific expedition. In the end, the protagonist's actions purely out of love will influence the future of the entire civilization and touch the secrets of higher dimensions~

name: My Interstellar Inn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030 2GB, Radeon RX 550 2GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Super 6GB, Radeon RX 5700 8GB

short_description: From the romantic star period, to the first class star show, to all kinds of strange foreign star show, from the time of the star to the sky. Various types of new businesses such as alcoholic beverages,Operate a restaurant, seeds, cultivated animals, wine, love, customer openings, exhibitions, etc.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
